blogPost.title: Is the anti-vaccination trend a symptom of a deeper crisis of public trust? Answer by @EthanZ, Author of "Mistrust", professor @UMassAmherst. https://t.co/TkcjRjgl22 https://t.co/jTOgusKd32
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 反疫苗接种风潮是公众信任危机加深的表现吗？回答者：@EthanZ，《不信任》作者，@UMassAmherst教授。https://t.co/TkcjRjgl22 https://t.co/jTOgusKd32。
反疫苗接種風潮是公衆信任危機加深的表現嗎？回答者：@EthanZ，《不信任》作者，@UMassAmherst教授。https://t.co/TkcjRjgl22 https://t.co/jTOgusKd32。
反ワクチンの傾向は、社会的信頼のより深い危機の徴候なのでしょうか？Answer by @EthanZ, Author of "Mistrust", professor @UMassAmherst. https://t.co/TkcjRjgl22 https://t.co/jTOgusKd32

previous.title: Is the position of a data engineer going to become more ubiquitous? Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/ULYt9oxYc9 https://t.co/l81BPRlYLS

localize.full_text: 数据工程师这个职位会不会变得越来越泛滥？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席数据官@Intuit。https://t.co/ULYt9oxYc9 https://t.co/l81BPRlYLS。
數據工程師這個職位會不會變得越來越氾濫？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席數據官@Intuit。https://t.co/ULYt9oxYc9 https://t.co/l81BPRlYLS。
データエンジニアという職種は、これからもっとユビキタスになっていくのでしょうか？Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/ULYt9oxYc9 https://t.co/l81BPRlYLS

next.title: Is misinformation more dangerous than ever before in history? Answer by @EthanZ, Author of "Mistrust", professor @UMassAmherst. https://t.co/RYXZRUeAkN https://t.co/a9OLAQi1jh

localize.full_text: 错误信息比历史上任何时候都危险吗？回答者：@EthanZ，《不信任》作者，教授@UMassAmherst。https://t.co/RYXZRUeAkN https://t.co/a9OLAQi1jh。
錯誤信息比歷史上任何時候都危險嗎？回答者：@EthanZ，《不信任》作者，教授@UMassAmherst。https://t.co/RYXZRUeAkN https://t.co/a9OLAQi1jh。
誤報は歴史上かつてないほど危険なものなのか？Answer by @EthanZ, Author of "Mistrust", professor @UMassAmherst. https://t.co/RYXZRUeAkN https://t.co/a9OLAQi1jh
